name: Horns Together
description:
This game was made for the GMTK game jam in two days with the theme "joined together"

this is a 2 player game but you can still play it on your own if you don't have anyone just like I did :,)

anyway its not really that good but I hope you enjoy

-----------game notes---------------

-both players need to press the switches at the same time

-you can only fuse once per level

-the ctrls for the big demon are [a/s & up/right aros]

--------------bugs----------------------

if the switches do not work switch places with the other player
